articles.title: BYU earns 21 bids to NCAA track and field nationals; SUU, UVU, Utah add 7 more - KSL.com
articles.description: The Cougars earned 12 bids to the NCAA championships from the men's team and nine more from the women's team after the NCAA West preliminary in Fayetteville, Arkansas.
